title: 132 - Beef Brown Sauce
description: On today's show, the guys discuss the different things they've been watching and what shows and movies they are excited for as it appears that theaters might be making a comeback. They also try to get inside of Mitt's head and understand how he is an intellectual savant, plus they dive into a loaded Pod FOD including what the best way to cut a sandwich is, Cena taking over the world, a South African man posing as a KFC taste inspector for over a year and finally getting caught and going to jail, all the different Marvel shows that are starting to come to Disney Plus, and much much more including a new installment of Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube page to watch full videos and clips, and follow @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to send in your submissions for the Pod FOD. We appreciate you guys, enjoy the weekend.
dc:creator: The Pod
